feed.title: NoWhere - Jeremy Chen
feed.subtitle: Write nothing but something useless thing here.

entry.title: Hello BLOG!
entry.content:
After a long time of thinking, I decided to write something down to my new blog web. There has some core reason:

  • Maybe it is a fashion now, a lot of friends would write their expert essays or some mood article in Wechat Offical Account.

  • A good way to practice English-Writing skill, it is a basic skill in English using as important as English speaking.

  • Knowledge output, I learned a lot in the past but had few opportunities put it out, like a machine which just absorbs but not convert to output, and it is also a good function to reinforce my knowledge.

So, in the future, I will write down the letter day to day, it may have expert technology articles and some essays.

hope I can insist on it and keep going!
entry.summary: After a long time of thinking, I decided to write something down to my new blog web. There has some core reason: Maybe it is a fashion now, a lot of friends would write their expert essays or some mood article in Wechat Offical Account.
